Reviews.Title: “worst hotel i have ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: Sue M
Reviews.Content: booked hotel friends live close looked nice outside looked nice lobby start cupboard stand carpet lower half joke store toilet rolls furniture note lots tea coffee etc kettle appeared bed look surprisingly comfortable cold night sheet thin blanket bathroom dont tiny shower grubby clean except hotel bit run £60 run run

Reviews.Title: “don't be fooled by name and location”
Reviews.Author: mus s
Reviews.Content: worst hotel called stayed reception desk den cramped stuff bearded flat affect looking keys dirty curtain zero privacy wipe body white smudge floor floating tiles dirt stains carpet bathroom tiny dirty basement smelled sewage hair shower fron person clean 3 days clean towels days breakfast hand plate 2 toasts pour milk cereals decide element allergy careful daughter attack hotel sacrificed 300 run ist night arrived late choice shocked picture deal price dont fooled look

Reviews.Title: “There was a slug on the wall in the shared toilet! Didn't remove!”
Reviews.Author: Petra F
Reviews.Content: hotel terrible dont id stay youth hostel continental guys front desk unfriendly window wouldnt close obviously painted care dried paint held window black mold kidding patches mold wall worst slug wall shared toilets wasnt raining outside warm sunny day slug day checked toilet returning continental dont youth hostel earls court clean reasonable

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: Julianna600
Reviews.Content: isyou youve gotten bargain prime location bakers street stately entranceway looks quaint antique interior actually substandard alley clothing staff doing little bit desperate hotels booked extremely expensive apartment ready nice moved luggage free internet elevator 4 flights bag couldnt dream lugging flights left secure breakfast assured cameras watched day locked night desk personel desk doubtful people lobby left delivering towels forth 60s lock door couldve picked key barely bed comfortable sheets fit bed completely night awoke hot water waited vain thinking reheat washed sink packed id missed breakfast wasnt offered coffee staff nice obviously complaints bit weary themso sympathy restitution

HotelInfo.Name: London Continental Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 88 Gloucester Place | Portman Square, London W1U 6HR, England
